capabilities/ai/index.title: Meeting AI
capabilities/ai/index.description: Learn how you can harnesses the power of Artificial Intelligence in ProductDB meetings to perform transcription, summarization, and so on.

capabilities/ai/meeting-transcription.title: Meeting Transcription
capabilities/ai/meeting-transcription.description: Explore meeting transcription capabilities with ProductDB's AI. Follow our guide to understand and implement transcription features.

capabilities/audio/processing.title: Processing - Middlewares
capabilities/audio/processing.description: ProductDB's SDK supports middlewares which are pluggable functions that can be applied to both audio and video streams in a meeting. This lets you tap in the media to either observe or modify. This guide covers the following.

capabilities/audio/transcriptionAWS.title: Transcriptions - AWS Transcribe
capabilities/audio/transcriptionAWS.description: To add the realtime audio transcriptions in a ProductDB meeting you can use AWS Transcribe & AWS Translate services

capabilities/audio/transcriptionGoogle.title: Transcriptions - Google STT
capabilities/audio/transcriptionGoogle.description: To add the realtime audio transcriptions in a ProductDB meeting you can use Google Cloud Speech-to-Text and Cloud translation APIs.

capabilities/audio/transcriptions.title: Transcriptions
capabilities/audio/transcriptions.description: The meeting transcription feature is currently in beta, which means it is still being tested and evaluated, and may undergo some change. This feature is not accessible to the public at the moment and will be activated solely upon request, subject to our team's assessment of your usage and needs. If you wish to have this feature enabled for your organization, please get in touch with us.

capabilities/breakoutroom/create-breakou.title: Create a Breakout Room
capabilities/breakoutroom/create-breakou.description: Learn how to create breakout rooms with ProductDB's capabilities. Follow our guide for effective implementation and management of breakout rooms.

capabilities/breakoutroom/introduction-b.title: Introduction to ProductDB's Breakout Rooms
capabilities/breakoutroom/introduction-b.description: Get an introduction to breakout rooms with ProductDB's capabilities. Follow our guide for a smooth understanding and integration.

capabilities/chat/export-chat-dump.title: Export Chat Messages
capabilities/chat/export-chat-dump.description: You can programmatically retrieve all chat messages of a ProductDB session in the following ways:

capabilities/misc/embed.title: No code Integration
capabilities/misc/embed.description: You can easily integrate ProductDB into your project without any SDK using an iFrame. An iFrame is a quick and easy way to embed a live video solution into your own website or application without modifying the underlying code.

capabilities/misc/livestreaming-other-pl.title: Restream to Social Platforms
capabilities/misc/livestreaming-other-pl.description: ProductDB can restream your meeting to any platform that supports an RTMP

capabilities/plugins/basics.title: Basics
capabilities/plugins/basics.description: ProductDB Plugins allow you to build collaborative and immersive experiences in your meetings without ever having to leave the meeting. The guides listed here will help you enable or disable plugins during meetings, configure existing plugins and even create new plugins with the help of Meeting APIs and built-in realtime database.

capabilities/plugins/docshare.title: Plugin: Document Sharing
capabilities/plugins/docshare.description: DocShare allows you to share, view documents and annotate the documents collaboratively.

capabilities/plugins/streamer.title: Plugin: Streamer
capabilities/plugins/streamer.description: Streamer allows you to share & watch your favorite videos together. The plugin exposes a few APIs to control the video playback

capabilities/plugins/whiteboard.title: Plugin: Whiteboard
capabilities/plugins/whiteboard.description: Whiteboard allows you to write, draw and ideate collaboratively. Built on top of tldraw

capabilities/polls/getting_started.title: Getting started with Polls
capabilities/polls/getting_started.description: Poll objects exist within a meeting and can only be accessed through a meeting object. This object provides methods to create polls, vote, and more.

capabilities/polls/index.title: Polls
capabilities/polls/index.description: Polls can be integrated in all kinds of ProductDB meetings ranging from voice to livestream. ProductDB's SDK makes it really simple to perform all operations required to create and run a poll. You can choose to use the Core SDK with ProductDB's UIKit to create seamless poll interactions in a couple of minutes, or you can also use the Core SDK with your custom components.

capabilities/polls/uikit.title: UIKit components for Polls
capabilities/polls/uikit.description: Using ProductDB's UIKit you can simplify the process of adding polls in your meetings!

capabilities/recording/advanced/add-wate.title: Add Watermark to your Recording
capabilities/recording/advanced/add-wate.description: Learn how to add watermarks to your recordings with ProductDB's features. Follow our guide for effective watermarking and customization.

capabilities/recording/advanced/configur.title: Disable upload to ProductDB's bucket
capabilities/recording/advanced/configur.description: Explore how to configure ProductDB bucket settings for recording. Follow our guide for effective bucket configuration.

capabilities/recording/advanced/create-r.title: Create Custom Recording App Using Recording SDKs
capabilities/recording/advanced/create-r.description: Learn how to create a recording app using ProductDB's SDKs. Follow our guide for effective app creation and integration.

capabilities/recording/advanced/interact.title: Interactive Recordings with Timed Metadata
capabilities/recording/advanced/interact.description: Learn how to enable interactive recording with ProductDB's capabilities. Follow our guide for effective configuration and management.

capabilities/recording/advanced/manage-r.title: Manage Recording Config Precedence Order
capabilities/recording/advanced/manage-r.description: Learn how to manage recording configuration hierarchy with ProductDB's capabilities. Follow our guide for effective hierarchy management.

capabilities/recording/configure-audio-c.title: Set Audio Configurations
capabilities/recording/configure-audio-c.description: Explore how to configure audio codecs in ProductDB's recording capabilities. Follow our guide for effective codec configuration.

capabilities/recording/configure-codecs.title: Configure Video Settings
capabilities/recording/configure-codecs.description: Learn how to configure codecs for recording in ProductDB's capabilities. Follow our guide for effective codec configuration.

capabilities/recording/custom-cloud-stor.title: Upload Recording to Your Cloud
capabilities/recording/custom-cloud-stor.description: Explore how to set up custom cloud storage for ProductDB's recording. Follow our guide for effective configuration and integration.

capabilities/recording/index.title: Recording
capabilities/recording/index.description: Learn how ProductDB records the audio and video of multiple users in a meeting, as well as interacts with ProductDB plugins, in a single file using composite recording mode.

capabilities/recording/monitor-status.title: Monitor Recording Status
capabilities/recording/monitor-status.description: Explore how to monitor the status of recordings with ProductDB's capabilities. Follow our guide for effective monitoring and management.

capabilities/recording/recording-overvie.description: Learn about the overview of recording capabilities with ProductDB. Follow our guide for an in-depth understanding of recording features.

capabilities/recording/start-recording.title: Start Recording a Meeting
capabilities/recording/start-recording.description: Explore how to start recordings with ProductDB's recording capabilities. Follow our guide for effective recording initiation.

capabilities/recording/stop-recording.title: Stop Recording a Meeting
capabilities/recording/stop-recording.description: Learn how to stop recordings with ProductDB's recording capabilities. Follow our guide for effective recording termination.

capabilities/screensharing/enabling.title: Enable/Disable Screenshare
capabilities/screensharing/enabling.description: ProductDB allows you to enable multiple users to share their screens during a meeting session. To integrate screen sharing in your application, go through the following steps:

capabilities/sip.title: SIP Interconnect
capabilities/sip.description: Dive into ProductDB's SIP capabilities with our comprehensive guide. Explore how SIP enhances your meeting experience with ProductDB.

capabilities/video/add-virtual-backgroun.title: Virtual Background
capabilities/video/add-virtual-backgroun.description: With a virtual background, you gain the flexibility to modify your background by blurring it, applying solid colors, or incorporating custom images. This capability allows for personalization and customization of your video environment, enabling you to create a more tailored visual experience.

capabilities/video/picture-in-picture.title: Picture in Picture
capabilities/video/picture-in-picture.description: Picture-in-Picture API allows you to render participant's video as a floating tile outside of the current page/app's context.

capabilities/video/processing.title: Processing - Middlewares
capabilities/video/processing.description: ProductDB's SDK supports middlewares which are pluggable functions that can be applied to both audio and video streams in a meeting. This lets you tap in the media to either observe or modify. This guide covers the following.

capabilities/webhooks/index.description: Learn how ProductDB uses webhooks to push real-time updates to your applications.

commerce/intro-commerce.title: Overview
commerce/intro-commerce.description: ProductDB's voice conferencing platform, built upon WebRTC, enables you to seamlessly incorporate real-time communication features into your web and mobile applications. Using ProductDB's REST APIs and client-side SDKs, you can effortlessly acquire, transmit, and play media within your applications.

migration/opentok/concept-media-opentok.description: Explore the concept of media migration from OpenTok to ProductDB. Follow our guide for effective media migration strategies.

migration/opentok/concepts-opentok-vs-dy.description: Understand the concepts of OpenTok versus ProductDB for effective migration. Follow our guide for a comprehensive comparison and migration strategy.

migration/twilio/shim-library/compatibil.title: Supported Features
migration/twilio/shim-library/compatibil.description: The Twilio Shim is a library that allows you to migrate your Twilio real-time communication apps to ProductDB platform.

migration/twilio/shim-library/twilio-shi.title: Introduction
migration/twilio/shim-library/twilio-shi.description: The Twilio Shim by ProductDB is a package that allows you to migrate your video calling applications from Twilio to ProductDB infrastructure.

rest-apis/livestream-productdb-meeting.title: Live Stream APIs
rest-apis/livestream-productdb-meeting.description: Explore ProductDB's REST APIs for livestreaming ProductDB meetings. Follow our guide for effective integration and management of REST APIs.

rest-apis/v2-migration-guide.description: ProductDB v2 REST API is now the primary API for ProductDB and the focus of development
